testcase.name: 01 Goal, Viewability, DSP, Ad Server and Discrepancy Details displayed on Proteus Web
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Campaigns" from home page..................................passed Then All Flights loads which I have access to...............................passed When I search/filter for a flightName "IO-6920".............................passed And Click on Apply button...................................................passed And Expand flight details...................................................passed Then Discrepancy Details displayed when flight is expanded..................passed Then Discrepancy Details show tooltip.......................................passed And Primary Goal Details displayed when flight is expanded..................passed And Actual Goal detials show tooltip........................................passed And Viewability Details displayed when flight is expanded...................passed And Viewability detials show tooltip........................................passed And DSP Data Details displayed when flight is expanded......................passed And DSP Data detials show tooltip...........................................passed And AdServer Data Details displayed when flight is expanded.................passed And AdServer detials show tooltip...........................................passed
